mapper.select: select H.service_no as serviceNo, H.process_status as processStatus, H.service_request_content as serviceRequestContent, H.process_fail_description as processFailDescription, H.process_description as processDescription, H.process_expected_date as processExpectedDate, H.process_completed_date as processCompletedDate, H.service_cost as serviceCost, S.registration_no as registrationNo, C.service_cat_name as serviceCatName, G.device_category_name as deviceCategoryName, C.service_cat_no as serviceCatNo, G.device_category_no as deviceCategoryNo, D.customer_id as customerId from device_as_histories H, service_registrations S, service_categories C, customer_devices D, device_categories G where S.customer_id = #{value} and S.service_cat_no = C.service_cat_no and S.device_no = D.device_no and G.device_category_no = D.device_category_no and H.service_cost = C.service_amount
